Anton Davydov Blog

About

My name is Anton (GitHub) and I’m indie developer from Moscow. Also I’m vim adept, sidekiq and hanami commiter.

In addition, I am interested in the functional programming, compilers, concurrency, music, space and other strange things.

You can check for updates with RSS. Or if you want to connect with me, you can send me email or follow me on twitter.
